# PLAYER::SET_ALL_RANDOM_PEDS_FLEE

## Summary
Stops all random peds from attacking the player, except cops

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** player
* **BOOL** pedsFlee

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Deprecated! Please now use SET_ALL_RANDOM_PEDS_FLEE_THIS_FRAME
